title: Evil Dead & Evil Dead 2 Dead By Dawn (Re-Edited!) 1 Epic Film
description:
Evil Dead 1 & 2 Edited together in one, epic splatter film! Gone is the lame beginning of ED2 where Rami recaps the first film with newly shot footage that doesn\&#039;t line the films up! Now The Evil Dead and Dead by Dawn are seemlessly combined into one endless nightmare.

16:9 widescreen anamorphic (enhanced for widescreen TV\&#039;s)
5:1 Dolby Surround
Menu and chapter selection
ISO file to burn to DVD-9 (dual layer disk)
720X480 resolution at 8000khz sampling

Enjoy!

Comming soon, the Evil Dead Trilogy in one 4hr epic (I\&#039;m not kidding!)
